biocontainers.name: metastudent
biocontainers.summary: Metastudent predicts gene ontology (go) terms from the molecular function ontology (mfo) and biological process ontology (bpo) for input protein sequences by homology-based inference from already annotated proteins.

biotools.summary: Metastudent predicts Gene Ontology (GO) terms from the Molecular Function Ontology (MFO) and Biological Process Ontology (BPO) for input protein sequences by homology-based inference from already annotated proteins.

bioschemas.name: MetaStudent
bioschemas.summary: Metastudent predicts Gene Ontology (GO) terms from the Molecular Function Ontology (MFO) and Biological Process Ontology (BPO) for input protein sequences by homology-based inference from already annotated proteins.
